org.openhubframework.openhub.admin.config

Class WebAdminConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.admin.config.WebAdminConfigurer

  • @Configuration
public class WebAdminConfigurer
extends Object
    Web configurer which is responsible for configuration of web admin client.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Tomas Hanus
    See Also:
    AdminMvcConfig, AdminSecurityConfig

      • adminServlet

        @Bean(name="WebContext")
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(name="WebContext")
public org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.ServletRegistrationBean adminServlet(org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext context,
                                                                                                                                                        org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet dispatcherServlet)
        Configures servlet for admin interface of OpenHub.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        dispatcherServlet - as actually registered dispatcher
        Returns:
        registration bean of DispatcherServlet to handling RouteConstants.WEB_URI_PREFIX_MAPPING.
